thread.title: Goose Live Events appoints Ashley Frater as Account Director
thread.title_full: Goose Live Events appoints Ashley Frater as Account Director

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Goose Live Events appoints Ashley Frater as Account Director
text:
Goose Live Events appoints Ashley Frater as Account Director Goose Live Events appoints Ashley Frater as Account Director Details Category: Appointments Created on Tuesday, 22 September 2015 10:00 Goose Live Events has announced the appointment of Ashley Frater to the role of Account Director to work on the agency’s luxury automotive accounts. Ashley, who has over 20 years’ experience working with event agencies such as THA, GRG, BI and Zibrant in operational and managerial roles, previously worked as Head of Events at specialist automotive PR agency PFPR where he supported a diverse range of automotive brands. 
Ashley’s new role will be integral to Goose Live Events’ luxury automotive team who have a significant number of client events and activations coming up this year. Commenting on the appointment, Ashley says: “The brands Goose work with are extraordinary and the pipeline of events is hugely exciting. I can’t wait to get stuck in.” Goose Live Events Director Sam Trevenna adds: “This is an exciting time for Goose Live Events and I am delighted to have Ashley bring his extensive operational experience to our premium automotive clients.” Related articles
